title: Weakest Strictly episode ever seethes James and Ola Jordan as they fume Kevin had his chance

James and Ola Jordan spat it was the worst Strictly Come Dancing episode ever.

The professional dancers, who left the BBC show together in 2015, laid into Sunday's Halloween episode as one of the weakest episodes in years.

They made no secret of their dislike of Sunday's Halloween episode as they nitpicked what they didn't like in the dancing show.

James also lashed out at Kevin Clifton as he insisted the dancer had his time to shine on the show.

Instead, he felt Gorka Márquez should have stepped in to dance with Alex Scott for ill Neil Jones.

(Image: MTV Cribs)

He told Hello! magazine: "Without Kelvin and Oti and Giovanni and Michelle in the show yesterday it would have been very weak. It was one of the weakest shows I have seen in many years.

"They need to pick up their game a bit as a lot of them were dancing out of time which was a bit worrying."

Ola chimed in: "Yes, they were definitely the best dancers of the night."

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: BBC)

But that wasn't the only bone James had to pick with the BBC dancing show.

The Dancing On Ice hopeful was spitting blood that Gorka didn't get a professional partner this year.

James pointed out Gorka should have been given the opportunity to step in for Neil and dance with Alex while the redhead was sick.

He made it clear Kevin shouldn't have been had the chance because he had already danced with Anneka Rice in this series.

James said: "Gorka, on the other hand, didn't get a partner this year, not through his choice, so he should be there and given his chance to dance with Alex. Kevin's had his chance."
description: James and Ola Jordan criticised Strictly Come Dancing as they branded Halloween's episode the worst in years
